title: Configuration and settings
description: Implement `app/config.py` using Pydantic Settings. Define settings class with DATABASE_URL (default: postgresql+asyncpg://tribe:tribe@localhost:5432/tribe), ENVIRONMENT (default: development), and DEBUG (default: True). Load from environment variables with proper typing.
acceptance_criteria:
- `app/config.py` exists with Settings class
- DATABASE_URL, ENVIRONMENT, DEBUG fields defined
- Settings loads from environment variables
- Default values match spec
